treatment-md.title: Odorrana aureola Stuart, Chuaynkern 2006
treatment-md.article-title: Description of the tadpoles of two endemic frogs: the Phu Luang cascade frog Odorrana aureola (Anura: Ranidae) and the Isan big-headed frog Limnonectes isanensis (Anura: Dicroglossidae) from northeastern Thailand
